[发]
Simplified from 發 and 髮 in the 1956 Chinese Character Simplification Scheme by the People's Republic of China.

[發]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) ( OC *pad ) — a bow firing an arrow. A hand ( 攴 ) was added later, forming 㢭 . The hand further turned into the phonetic component 癹 ( OC *pʰaːd, *baːd ), leading to the current form as a phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 ). [ 1 ]
